messages.content: Tell me about the Louvre Museum.

Louvre Museum is a museum located in Paris, France. It is known for being a famous museum located in Paris, home to the Mona Lisa. The ticket price is $17 and it has a rating of 4.9. Here is an image: https://example.com/louvre.jpg
